amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 113-215 to require the Secretary to remove Native American sacred and cultural sites from the conveyance in consultation with affected Indian Tribes.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Lujan, Ben Ray (NM).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Lujan, Ben Ray (NM).
